mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" , USE_AT AS "useAt" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_KOREAN_NM like '%'|| #{searchKeyword}||'%' ) TB ) Z WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "totcnt" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_KOREAN_NM like '%'|| #{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{progrmFileNm}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO COMTNPROGRMLIST A USING db_root ON A.PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{progrmFileNm} WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PROGRM_STRE_PATH = SUBSTR(#{URL},1,INSTR(#{URL}, '/', -1 )), PROGRM_KOREAN_NM = #{progrmKoreanNm}, PROGRM_DC = #{progrmDc}, PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{progrmFileNm}, URL = #{URL}, USE_AT = #{useAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{registerId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PROGRM_FILE_NM, PROGRM_STRE_PATH, PROGRM_KOREAN_NM, PROGRM_DC, URL, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{progrmFileNm}, SUBSTR(#{URL},1,INSTR(#{URL}, '/', -1 )), #{progrmKoreanNm}, #{progrmDc}, #{URL}, #{useAt}, SYSDATETIME, #{registerId}, SYSDATETIME, #{registerId})
